page.title: 14Religion
page.content: The predominant religion here is {Christianity,}people visiting their churches on a weekly basis. Church attendance is falling slightly indicating a decline in the importance of religion or at least church-going. Some of the church officials were school teachers while others come from Repton village, the dominant village of the parish. Every other week, services are held at St.Marys in Newton Solney or at the church at Bretby. { St. Marys}is approximately 285 years old and is Anglo-Catholic. The vicar there believes that there has been a slight increase in the interest shown by parishoners in the church and its various activities.
